BR_text.BRsummary: Fix mypy issue with pytorch nightly
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>🐛 Bug description</denchmark-h>
 
 Currently, there is an issue with running mypy on ignite when using pytorch-nightly :
 <denchmark-code> ignite/distributed/comp_models/native.py:334: error: Incompatible types in
 assignment (expression has type "ReduceOp", variable has type "str") 
 [assignment]
                 op = self._reduce_op_map[op]
                      ^
 Found 1 error in 1 file (checked 84 source files)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/runs/1373059337#step:5:17>https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/runs/1373059337#step:5:17</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gruebel>@gruebel</denchmark-link>
  could you please take a look if we can fix it ? Thanks

comments_0.comment_text: Sure, I can take a look today

comments_2.comment_text: yeah, good point. Already forgot about it 🙈
